name: Planet Eden
description:
Planet Eden takes place in a future in which Earth is very close to no longer being habitable due to a global pandemic. As a result, the humans decide to send a small ship of settlers in an expedition  to a recently discovered planet called Eden, which has proven to have all the necessary conditions to support life. However, after a long journey, when they finally get there, an accident occurs during the landing procedure, and the settlers crash land into the planet’s surface. As a result, returning to Earth is now impossible, and they soon come to find out that their arrival did not come unnoticed…

You play as Kowalski. Your goal is to explore the world in order to find resources to help your colony survive, as well as retrieving lost parts scattered throughout the planet from the crash landing. These lost parts are used to build a communication device to send a message to Earth and let them know that Eden is indeed habitable.

Along the way, the player must fight a hostile species of alien life forms, while simultaneously freeing and saving a different, friendly alien race, which is being oppressed and enslaved by the former.
